com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto
Interface IContributorDeferringScope

All Superinterfaces:
IReadScope
public interface IContributorDeferringScope
extends IReadScope

An item with contributor deferring scope:

  1. must be owned by a contributor
  2. defers read access decisions to a project area.

Since:
0.8.1.

Nested Class Summary
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto.IReadScope

Method Summary
 IAuditableHandle getScope()
          Get the scope of the item - this is not the owner, but the process area that decide's read permissions.
 void setScope(IAuditableHandle createItemHandle)
          Set the IProjectAreaHandle that the contributor is deferring read access control.
